title: sundarEshvaranE
sahitya:
sundarEshvaranE shubhakara krpA kaTAkSam vaittemmai ANDaruL


anupallavi

  candra shEkhara shankaraa tiru AlavAyamar shrI mInAkSi


caraNam    paN shumanda bANar pOl viaguDan maN shumanda tirumuDiyazhagA
peN shei piTTu virumbi mAran pirambaDip-puN shumanda mEniyanE mAmadurai
